To implement the code I provided: 1-Create a new Python file and name it server.py.
2-Copy and paste the server code I provided into the server.py file.
4-Open a command prompt or terminal window and navigate to the directory where you saved the server.py file.
5-Type python server.py and press Enter to start the server. You should see a message indicating that the server is running.
6-Open a new Python file and name it client.py.
7-Copy and paste the client code I provided into the client.py file.
9-Open a command prompt or terminal window and navigate to the directory where you saved the client.py file.
10-Type python client.py and press Enter to run the client. You should see the result of the
add function call (5) printed to the console.
Note that you will need to have the xmlrpc.server and xmlrpc.client modules installed in your Python environment in order
to run this code. You can install these modules using pip by running pip install xmlrpc.client xmlrpc.server in your
